protocol_name: Extraction and Purification of Anthocyanin from Potato
protocol_name_html: Extraction and Purification of Anthocyanin from Potato
description: This is a protocol for extraction and purification of anthocyanin from potato.
protocol_affiliation: College of Life Science, Shandong Normal University, PR China;Institute of Vegetables and Flowers, Shandong Academy of Agricultural Sciences,PR China,Institute of Vegetables and Flowers, Shandong Academy of Agricultural Sciences,PR China,College of Life Science, Shandong Normal University, PR China,College of Life Science, Shandong Normal University, PR China;Biotechnology Research Center, Shandong Academy of Agricultural Sciences, PR China
manuscript_citation: Liu F, Yang Y, Gao J, Ma C, Bi Y (2018) A comparative transcriptome analysis of a wild purple potato and its red mutant provides insight into the mechanism of anthocyanin transformation. PLoS ONE 13(1): e0191406. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0191406
authors: Fang Liu,Yuanjun Yang,Jianwei Gao,Changle Ma,Yuping Bi

authors_list.name: Fang Liu
authors_list.affiliation: College of Life Science, Shandong Normal University, PR China;Institute of Vegetables and Flowers, Shandong Academy of Agricultural Sciences,PR China

components.data: Macroporous resin AB8 were soaked with anhydrous ethanol 24h, fully swollen, and then washed with deionized water to no alcohol, lastly the resin were dried for use.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Macroporous resin AB8 were soaked with anhydrous ethanol 24h, fully swollen, and then washed with deionized water to no alcohol, lastly the resin were dried for use.

components.data: Potato tubers (250 g) were washed with distilled water and were cut into large pieces.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Potato tubers (250 g) were washed with distilled water and were cut into large pieces.

components.data: The large pieces were smashed in 500 mL of a mixture containing 50% alcohol and 1.6% citric acid.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: The large pieces were smashed in 500 mL of a mixture containing 50% alcohol and 1.6% citric acid.

components.data: The resulting mixture was filtrated twice with filter paper and then centrifuged at 4000 rpm 10min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: The resulting mixture was filtrated twice with filter paper and then centrifuged at 4000 rpm 10min.

components.data: The supernatant was transferred into a column filled with the pretreated macroporous resin AB-8 for 6 h, and the pigments would be absorbed in AB-8.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: The supernatant was transferred into a column filled with the pretreated macroporous resin AB-8 for 6 h, and the pigments would be absorbed in AB-8.

components.data: The pigments were eluted with 95% alcohol until the resin became no color.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: The pigments were eluted with 95% alcohol until the resin became no color.

components.data: The eluate was concentrated with rotary evaporator at 30 °C.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: The eluate was concentrated with rotary evaporator at 30 °C.

components.data: The concentrated pigments were dried in vacuo for 12 h.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: The concentrated pigments were dried in vacuo for 12 h.
